page.title: 08HEALTH/VETS.
page.content: The Vet.around here can travel around to see animals like cattle, sheep or horses. What happens is you 'phone the Vet. and he or she will come to your house and bring all the instruments he might use, then he will come and have a look at the animal and decide what to do. My pony was lame and he spent half an hour looking for signs of what is wrong,then he found out and started to make a hole where the infection was in the hoof and then he found the place and puss was pouring out. He made the decision and said it was a thorn had gone in and then out and left infection. The Vet. has never left our farm without success.It is more expensive to the Vet.to come over because of petrol etc.The Vets. are kind and helpful and so is all his staff.
